text: Boris Grachevsky (Russian: Борис Юрьевич Грачевский; March 18, 1949 - January 14, 2021) was a Russian movie director, screenwriter, and actor. He was artistic director of the children's television show and magazine Yeralash. Grachevsky was born in Moscow, Russia. Grachevsky died on January 14, 2021 in Moscow from COVID-19, aged 71.Умер Борис Грачевский ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Russian movie directors Category:Russian screenwriters Category:Russian movie actors Category:Russian television actors Category:Russian television presenters Category:Television directors Category:Television writers Category:Writers from Moscow Category:Actors from Moscow Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Moscow
title: Boris Grachevsky
